ogTitle: houston director of medical services david persse on the rapid rise in covid-19 infections in one of america's largest cities. - smarther news
summary: Houston director of medical services David Persse on the rapid rise in COVID-19 infections in one of America’s largest cities.
body:
• Texas continue to set records for COVID-19 infections.
  • Hospitalization have increased as well with serious cases, especially in the city of Houston.
  • Why It Matters: Predictive models now show the hospital capacity in Texas could be threatened due to the increase in infections.
